inclusion.criterion: approximately 1-2 weeks prior to her expected date of follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: conversation and invited to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interviewed by the clinical research nurse using the format of the prepared proforma (Form A)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms suggestive of disease recurrence as well as treatment induced toxicity
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: research nurse records her impression of whether the patient has worrisome symptoms of disease or not and has symptoms of treatment toxicity or not for which she should visit the hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: short written informed consent is taken by the nurse
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: examining physician takes a complete history and performs a physical examination and any investigations he/she deems necessary
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final impression of disease status and toxicity is noted down by the examining physician
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: information regarding the acceptability of nurse-led telephonic follow-up to the patient and the financial impact of physical follow- up will be collected using a structured format (Form C)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Stage III disease treated with palliative intent with once monthly radiotherapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Early stage cervical cancer patients who underwent Wertheims hysterectomy and who have completed adjuvant radiochemotherapy due to high-risk factors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unable to comprehend the questions or dialogue over telephone by medical staff
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who seem unreliable for follow up
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has completed the four square step test in 14 seconds and her BMI is: 41.54.
